title: Ransomware Attack
description: A major ransomware attack disrupts key systems. Executive leadership must respond under pressure.

title: Business Email Compromise (BEC)
description: An executive email account is used to conduct fraudulent wire transfers and access sensitive communications.

title: CI/CD & Source Code Breach
description: An attacker gains access to your CI platform and possibly your Git repositories, triggering a serious software supply chain breach.

title: Cloud Storage Exposure (S3 Leak)
description: A misconfigured cloud storage bucket exposes sensitive data to the public internet.

title: Insider Threat & Data Exfiltration
description: A trusted employee exfiltrates sensitive documents, resulting in public data exposure and internal fallout.
